text:
Are you sometimes wondering whether to
say 'easier' or 'more easy'?

Are you unsure whether you should say
'better than' or 'better as'?
Then join me in this lesson for a review of comparative and superlative adjectives and adverbs.

In this lesson, we're going to review
comparative adjectives and adverbs and

look at some common mistakes that you
might be making with them.

we'll end the lesson with an exercise so
you can check your understanding.

By the end of the lesson you will have a
better idea of how to use comparative

and superlative adjectives and adverbs
and how to avoid some common mistakes.
So, when you're ready we can begin!
